content: MT-BC-GS T OC Beam clamp Beam clamp for fastening MT-70 and MT-80 girders to steel beams, for outdoor use with low pollution ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures No drilling or hot works – fasten modular girders to structural steel without anchoring or welding Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Engineering and calculation service available – your local Hilti Engineers can provide advice and calculation services on more complex projects Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Applications Mounting MT-70 and MT-80 girders on structural steel Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Hot-dip galvanized - for outdoor use Weight: 2.8 lb. Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2273587 - Beam clamp MT-BC-GS T OC - Package Size 12 pc
